NOSCRIPT_MESSAGE: Please enable JavaScript to setup the integration.
UPLOAD_DESCRIPTION: If desired, we can automatically upload your comments from your <%= integrationName %> installation during the sync. Otherwise, uncheck the box below and you can perform it yourself later.
CHECKBOX_UPLOAD_COMMENTS_HELP: You can upload your comments later from the plugin admin page.
CHECKBOX_SYNC_DATABASE: Automatically keep my <%= integrationName %> database in sync.
CHECKBOX_SYNC_DATABASE_HELP: This keeps your <%= integrationName %> database up to date. Useful if any plugins require the latest comments in your database. Commonly disabled with very high volume sites, where keeping <%= integrationName %> up to date creates undesirable load.
